Subject: Re: Carry On!!!!!! and the return of Kaiser  Long post.
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Motormaster flies upwards avoiding most of the weapon fire, some hit his
feet, and break them down a bit but not to serious. "The bigger the junk
heap, the more room you will take up in the pit" he screams as he pulls out
his Cyclone gun firing on the Gestalt.
